endpoint.description: LUIS API Endpoint, e.g West Europe should be "westeurope.api.cognitive.microsoft.com" Defaults to `westeurope.api.cognitive.microsoft.com`.

subscription_key.description: Subscription key which provides access to this API. Found in your Cognitive Services accounts.

canonical_form.description: Canonical form is the unique identifier. When using a closed list entity in LUIS, there always is a canonical form and optional multiple synonyms

closed_list_id.description: The closed list entity extractor ID.

block.description: Configures a sublist to an existing closed list
